description: Create or update an environment in the specified subscription and resource group.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

sku.description: The sku determines the capacity of the environment, the SLA (in queries-per-minute and total capacity), and the billing rate.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional properties for the resource.

resource_group_name.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.description: Parameters for creating an environment resource.
